title: TrueTone Displays
message:
i have an A2338 and by replacing the Display with another one I bought the TrueTone Option in the Display Menu is missing.

Is there any way to copy a serial from the origianl display or like that in to the other display to make this work again?

title: TrueTone Displays
message:
You should change the corresponding chips from T-CON board with the ones from old LCD assembly.
Many sellers in Aliexpress show some pictures in their ads...

title: TrueTone Displays
message: this? both chips need to be replaced yes?
